articles.description: Feb. 22 is National Margarita Day or Margarita Monday. But the made-up day is different amid the COVID pandemic. Chili's has several margarita deals.
articles.content:
You don't have to wait until 5 o'clock to kick off National Margarita Day.
Wochit
National Margarita Day also is Margarita Monday this year.
But the spirited made-up holiday will look different th… [+4979 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: GSK, Sanofi begin new COVID-19 vaccine trial of protein-based vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's GlaxoSmithKline and France's Sanofi on Monday said they had started a new clinical trial of their protein-based COVID-19 vaccine candidate and aim to reach the final testing stage in the second quarter.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
